plugin.name: SideNote
plugin.author: G Cornell for devCU

lang.word: Simple and short title for your side note modal.
Short description of no more than a sentence that will appear on hover over icon
Full description and details on the side note content
Add additional details and information that will show in a container
Use the UNICODE symbol for the icon available at FontAwesome
Side Note Bar Width in Pixels
When enabled, members can click button to dismiss the side note only after opening the modal
Use the UNICODE symbol for the icon available at FontAwesome
Info Box will show a small box above the main content with text info and time stamps
Show the Start and End Times
The Icon in the Side Note Tab will blink getting users attention
When enabled, the side bar will not show only the tab

By default the tab is positioned at bottom and 10px off bottom but you can move it for better visibility or if its blocking a element on the page. Number is in pixels and will effect top and bottom positioning respectively
In pixels the rounded corers of the tab, higher the number more pronounced the roundness, 0 is square no rounded corners

Enter the URL of the pages that you either wish to show or hide the message, based on the page type selected above. 1 per line.
The list uses string matching so you can enter partial URLs to select groups of pages. For example:
Enter forums to show/hide the message on all forum pages.
Enter /gallery/category/1-member-albums/ to show/hide the message on the members' albums gallery page
